mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum R, NT.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NUM desc) NT) WHERE R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (num, title, contents, writer, regDate, hits) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, REGDATE = sysdate WHERE NUM = #{num}
